QuestData.Title: As Hyjal Burns
QuestData.Description: $n! We've heard much about you and your previous accomplishments.$B$BIt is good that you've come here just as Azeroth finds itself in a time of great need.$B$BDeathwing's minions are attacking Hyjal and seek to bring the destructive Ragnaros back into our world.$B$BAronus will take you to join Malfurion's forces in Hyjal. Lend them what help you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly to Hyjal using Aronus and speak to Ysera once you're there.
QuestData.RewardText: <Ysera appears to be in some sort of trance.>
